name: ResourceLocation
title: Resource Location Profile
description: Defines constraints on the Location Resource describing the location of resources (Beds and Devices).

element.short: The present status (active | inactive) of the location.
element.comment: This field can be used to determine if a location is open or closed/shut down.

element.short: A name used to describe this location to others.
element.comment: This field should be a name easily recognized and distinct.

element.short: All location resources using this profile are instances
The type of location (e.g., hospital, long-term care, urgent care, et cetera)
element.comment: This field might be used by someone to ask about resources at the location.

element.short: A contact telephone number must be able to be provided for the location
A street address must be able to be provided for the location
element.comment: This field is used to navigate to the location. It should be a physical rather than postal address.

element.short: A GPS location must be able to be provided for the location
element.comment: This field is used to map the location. It should be accurate enough to identify the entrance of a physical building or wing.
